name: Dairy Defenders (Joaqstarr)
description:
A game made for the Game Dev Knights 2022 Halloween Game Jam.

A third-person stealth action game, you take control of a cow trying to fight back an alien invasion in their farm.

Find the 4 pods scattered throughout the desolate farm in order to take the down the mothership and repeal the invasion.

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Aim control - Mouse

Shoot gun - Right click

Eat Grass - E

Credits:

  • Programming: Joaquin, Matthew
  • Music/Art: Kai (@Birdpill)
  • 3D Modeling and Art: Alex
  • Web Assistance: Carlos

Asset Credits:

Silo House by Quaternius

Rocketship by Poly by Google [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza

Well by Jarlan Perez [CC-BY] via Poly Pizza
